TEXT.S: Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa I 1950 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 28 a romi'ad masofoc ci Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Bahrain anini i ci Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa, patirengan a romi'ad i 1999 a miheca saka 3 folad saka 6 a romi'ad.
